TextView.android:text: Many people face different difficulties and obstacles to find assistance which helps them in making their tasks done .The main problem is that they cannot find a trusted person whom can be left in their houses with their kids as they have to make sure that the worker is mentally healthy, free of disease, trustworthy, dependable and responsible person. In addition being a professional in his field is a must. Our team will develop a mobile Application named (My assistant) to help the people to get rid of this problem. The Application offers many options to the order requester, so that they can choose the kind of assistance they want such as home assistant, babysitter, gardener and cooker. It provides services that people may need for their daily life, just by knowing the order requester location.
